title: mukhatthai kaTTiyE
sahitya:
mukhattai kAtTTiye dEham muzhumaiyum kATTAmal mUDU mandiram



EdayyA 



(mukhattai)







anupallavi







jagattil adhikamAna ArUril vAsarE shezhitta mEniyilUnam uNDO



tyAgEsharE 



(mukhattai)







caraNam 1







shAyarakSyil vandidOtTTai kATTi mayakki mAyAvittanam uLLa



mandahAsattuDanE mAn mazhuvEndiya karattai kUDa maraittu



(mukhattai)







caraNam 2







kUttADum pOdangE kunindu pArppOm enrAl kudittu kudittu munpin



Odum vidattai utru pArttAl



pashigaL tIrum paravashamAga sheyyum paNiyAl maraittu koNDoru



pAdam kATTuvadellAl



(mukhattai)







caraNam 3







abhSeka kAlattil arumai tirumEniyai ati rahasiyamAna toTTAl



maraikkirIr



vibhavam tandu rakSikkum divya mangaLa rUpA-vidanga



tyAgarAjarE pApavinAsharE 



(mukhattai)
